_meanings:
{@--2@} Anticipated 
performance of a duty, as of a Śrāddha.

{@--3@} Anticipation of a word 
occurring later on (in <ab>gram.</ab>, poetry or
Mīmāṃsā &c.).

a
sort of fallacy; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} sound has not
the quality of shape, as a jar, so
sound and a jar have no qualities
in common.
